In Treasure Planet, you'll embark on a thrilling journey through space as you search for a hidden treasure with an eclectic group of friends. This animated adventure features star voices like Emma Thompson and Joseph Gordon-Levitt.

The Amazing Spider-Man offers an exciting twist on the classic story of everyone's favorite wall-crawler. Andrew Garfield and Emma Stone bring new life to the iconic characters as they battle a mysterious reptilian foe in New York City.

If you're looking for an intense war drama, I'd highly recommend "The Hurt Locker" (2008). This film follows a bomb squad in Iraq and showcases the raw tension and personal struggles that come with the job. The performances by Jeremy Renner and Ralph Fiennes are truly captivating.

On the other hand, if you're interested in mythology and epic action, "Wrath of the Titans" (2012) might be right up your alley. This film features Sam Worthington as Perseus, who ventures into the underworld to save his father Zeus from his son Ares and brother Hades. It's a thrilling journey filled with fantastical creatures!

conversation.text:
Given that you're interested in war films written by Jim Thomas, I'd highly recommend "Windtalkers" (2002). This film tells an intriguing story about the Navajo Marines during World War II who used their native language as an unbreakable code. Some notable actors include Nicolas Cage and Roger Willie.

Another interesting choice is "A Bridge Too Far" (1977), directed by multiple Academy Award winners like Richard Attenborough and Robert Redford. This epic war film recounts the Allied efforts to capture several bridges in the Netherlands during World War II, with a star-studded cast including Sean Connery, Anthony Hopkins, and Laurence Olivier. Enjoy your movie time!
